comment.body: That's a bit like the [Ripple Network](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ripple_%28payment_protocol%29) works: [Ripple IOUs](https://wiki.ripple.com/Payments#IOUs).

There's also [Stellar](https://www.stellar.org/), created by some of the creators of Ripple. I'm not sure I like either — they're too centralized — but I like the idea.

Within a smallish group there's a thing like https://grouptabs.5apps.com/ that eases tracking of expenses in a group, but I gather you're more keen on a bigger scale.
